events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated and I'm very concerned about the delay.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's description of late shipping and tracking problems.
Support agent has been assigned to handle the customer's complaint regarding the delayed shipment.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. I'll help you track it down.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have? This will help me investigate the issue promptly.
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The tracking number shows ‘In transit’ but hasn’t changed status in five days.
I contacted the shipping carrier to request an update on your package. If the delay continues beyond 3 more days, we can offer a replacement or refund.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate your help and will wait to see if the package arrives soon.
Your package has now been delivered according to the carrier’s update. We’re glad the issue has been resolved, and thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to ensure you received your order and are satisfied with the resolution. Please let us know if there's anything else we can assist with.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for choosing our service and have a great day!
